title: $3100-3/1 East Hollywood House-TOTALLY REMODELED-Fenced Yard-Pets Ok
neighborhood: East Hollywood-East of I95-South of Sheridan
posting_body: ['Location Location Location.', 'This FULLY REMODELED 3 beds 1 bath house is within 5 miles from Hollywood Beach.', 'Very close to Highways.', 'NEW FLOORS,BRAND NEW ELECTRICAL PANEL,UPDATED PLUMBING work and NEW WHITE KITCHEN with ITALIAN CABINETS up to 42 inches, LARGE COOKING ISLAND and HIGH-QUALITY QUARTZ COUNTER TOP.', 'Flashy modern contemporary house.', 'A perfect private dream home at a key location.', 'All STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES.', 'Freshly painted inside and outside.', 'Roof & Driveway was done just a few years back.', 'Driveway has 4-6 cars parking.', 'You will get plenty of natural light in the whole house.', 'Plus you have more advantage: NO HOA.', 'Fruit trees in the Back Yard.', 'Lots of potential to utilize the front and back yard.', 'Pets ok with Landlord approval!', 'THIS IS A YEARLY LEASE – NOT SHORT TERM.', 'Landlord requires First Month, Last Month and Security Deposit to move in (3 month’s rent).', ' Acceptable credit score/report for all persons on the lease (650+), background check and PROOF of income showing sustained combined incomes at least 3 times the amount of the monthly rent.', 'Must have no judgments or money owed to previous landlords.', 'Dianne Warren,', 'show contact info', ', Beachfront Realty.', ' Map view is approximate, not exact, for security reasons.', 'Please CALL to view this property.', ' No texts or emails for first contact.', ' Private owner property.']
